attributes.action: Sadiq Khan to be investigated and if need be to resign over failures as mayor
attributes.additional_details: There are various articles from the UK media which have also circulated across  social media which portray Mr Khan as the first failing mayor for London. People have lost faith and trust in his ability to deliver for London and help London steer positively through Brexit.
attributes.background: There are many Londoners and other UK citizens who feel that since his election, Mr Khan has failed on key election pledges. There are serious concerns over affiliations to undesirable people and groups, which undermind him holding public office.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The Mayor of London is the accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
